content.raw:
Related to issue #209. Two workarounds for mesh location issue: [Play back in docker container](#!/osrf/subt/issues/209/how-to-replay-logs-from-cloudsim#comment-54143232) and [symbolic link method](#!/osrf/subt/issues/209/how-to-replay-logs-from-cloudsim#comment-54143448)

I have not tried using the gui to fast forward / seek but I think ign service call may work, e.g.

```
ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req 'seek: {sec: 140}, pause: true'
```

‌

‌

Related to issue #209. Two workarounds for mesh location issue: Play back in docker container and symbolic link method

I have not tried using the gui to fast forward / seek but I think ign service call may work, e.g.

ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req 'seek: {sec: 140}, pause: true'
